about-nukkit: Nuclear powered MCPE Server, have a pocketmine-like structure and a java-armed strength. Developed for multiplayer survival games.
title-details: Make a server beyond your imagination
detail-1: Feel free to use Nukkit in your native language.
detail-2: Provides a wide range of settings to fully control your server.
detail-3: Enchanting, redstone, weather and a multiworld system.
detail-5: Has someone mentioned a wonderful game? Add plugins and enjoy amazing features!
detail-6: We will our best to disable cheats.
